name: crutrade-contracts
description: CruTrade Smart Contracts - ABIs and Addresses

scripts.deploy:local: source .env && NODE_ENV=local forge script script/deploy.s.sol --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY_LOCAL --broadcast --via-ir && bun script/init.ts && bun script/update-package.ts
scripts.deploy:testnet: source .env && NODE_ENV=dev forge script script/deploy.s.sol --rpc-url $RPC_DEV --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --via-ir --silent && bun script/init.ts && bun script/update-package.ts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: source .env && NODE_ENV=production forge script script/deploy.s.sol --rpc-url $RPC --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --via-ir --silent && bun script/init.ts && bun script/update-package.ts
